H0.text: Who was the last Briton to win the Nobel Prize for Literature. Kazuo Ishiguro

H1.text: Who was the last Briton to win the Nobel Prize for Literature. Harold Pinter

H2.text: Who was the last Briton to win the Nobel Prize for Literature. V.S. Naipaul

H3.text: Who was the last Briton to win the Nobel Prize for Literature. Jane Somers

A4.text: In 2017, Ishiguro was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature
